duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform manual and automated tasks for the receipt, storage, and shipment of products in a warehouse environment.
Receive, scan, and input product information into computer systems, and operate heavy equipment to replenish the warehouse.
Utilize voice to pick systems, palletize items, and drive material handling equipment as required by job duty.
Maintain appropriate licenses, training, and certifications, and work on routine assignments that require problem resolution.
Adhere to all quality guidelines, and work under a moderate degree of supervision, referring complex problems to supervisors.
